Tataki of Tuna Loin

Ingredients
  • 100g/4oz trimmed tuna loin per person
  • groundnut oil
  • salt and freshly cracked black pepper
To serve:
  • Japanese soy sauce
  • wasabi
  • English mustard
Method

  1. Heat a griddle pan until smoking hot.

  2. Brush the tuna with groundnut oil and season generously with salt and pepper.

  3. Cut into slices and serve with soy sauce, wasabi and English mustard.

Published: July 22 2012
